column5: Gah, it sucked hard when Canada 1 crashed. And I'm still angry at the Russia who decided to celebrate what could have been a fatal accident.
His partner appeared to give him a quick look that ended that fast. Or perhaps he just caught himself.  JF

Their sure was a lot of ass patting on the bobsled track the other night. (Not that their is anything wrong with that)   I am sorry to hear that Canada 1 crashed I hope that the team members were alright.
